full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI SGRUB THABS SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA BDAG MDUN BUM GSUM CHA LAG TSANG BA BZHUGS
